data.title: Best breakfast!!
data.text: We ate breakfast a couple time while on vacation and both times were incredible delitefull.The food was delish.Always hot and plentiful with the portions.The all you can eat buffett was spectacular and had a great variety.Robin and David "our servers" were GREAT.They was caring,sweet,polite,always making sure we were doing great with our breakfast.Love this family owned establishment.

data.title: Friendly, clean, reasonable
data.text: This restaurant is super clean and bright! We dined for breakfast…not sure if they are open all day or not. They offer you the choice of a buffet or to order from the menu (some restaurants here do not). Food was good and reasonably priced and service was excellent! They will give you a discount for paying with cash…there is a sign stating this on the door. We tried to pay with a credit card, but their machine was down so we were forced to pay with cash. However, she gave me a significant discount on the check for my inconvenience…I didn't even ask...now that is customer service!

data.title: Breakfast really gone downhill. Awful
data.text: We usually get the restaurant.com deal and come back year after year.  This experience was pathetic and such poor quality we will not come back.  The buffet want fully stocked and it had items like applesauce and fake cheese.  $14 per adult and$8 for kids 5 and over and no coffee included was very overpriced, even for off the boardwalk.  Save your money and go to Sunnyside cafe.  That place is so much better and more economical.  I feel disgusted for walking in and seeing the buffet and eating it anyways because the whole family was starving.  Even my kids said the food was gross and they eat any and everything!

data.title: Good Food - Good Service
data.text: We had breakfast items and lunch items at 2:30 in the afternoon. It was all good. They have wonderful pancakes. I would recommend.

data.title: Had a gift certificate for here
data.text: We started off our morning by visiting this establishment for breakfast.  Our waiter was awesome and so polite!!!  The food was average on the buffet but satisfying.  We had fruit, pancakes (great and had a hint of vanilla to hit), French toast, eggs, sausage and bacon.  The place was very clean too!  Would I go back yes but maybe next time just order something off the menu like their pancakes which were real good.

data.title: Great food, service and price
data.text: This restaurant is fabulous. The food is always good. The staff is very welcoming. Great location and price.

data.title: Nice family restaurant
data.text: We have been there 3 times in the past week and the breakfast is always good and the waitresses are nice...and there is never a wait

data.title: Saturday night dinner with family of 9.
data.text: Our large party was seated quickly. Waitress was friendly. I had the grilled chicken with Swiss cheese and it was tasty. Caesar salad was huge, burgers satisfied the carnivores. Reasonably priced for its location. I would eat here again.

data.title: Great find!
data.text: Just stumble by and decided to eat here and had an awesome dinner, actually breakfast because the full menu is available all day and I love breakfast food in the evening as well. Friendly quick service and awesome food!

data.title: Good food
data.text: They have downsized since the last time we visited, but the food is still good.  Our waitress was SUPERB!

data.title: Excellent!!
data.text: This is an absolutely must stop, when visiting Virginia Beach! The service was excellent. The waitresses were very friendly and made you feel right at home. The atmosphere was incredibly homey. And the food... The food was delicious! It was actually cooked and prepared, not just thawed and heated. 5 Stars for this establishment. It's most certainly a pearl of Atlantic Avenue! My family of three had the all you can eat buffet. Many choices and great food. Cost was around $44 (including drinks).

data.title: Summer Vacation
data.text: Great place to eat.  Loved the pancakes and the buffet.  This place had probably the best waitresses I encountered during my whole trip to Va Beach.  They were extremely friendly and helpful.  Would recommend highly.

data.title: Amazing overall experience
data.text: Went there for breakfast. The inside is spacious and beautiful. The one big wall has a super amazing painting that was painted quite a long time ago( I asked) and its beautiful. Our server was David who was super super amazing. We loved him. We had the veggie omlette which was so delicious, it may have been the best omlette we have ever had. The rye toast was perfectly crunchy. Loved this place. Amazing hostess too.

data.title: Good food and friendly service
data.text: Enormous and delicious breakfast at the beach.  Our server was fun and attentive.  The menu was full of choices from basic breakfast to burritos to an all-you-can eat option.

data.title: Great Breakfast!
data.text: My wife and I had breakfast here this morning, as we were preparing to leave Virginia Beach and return to Northern Virginia.  I had searched for a nearby place to have breakfast, as we did not want to repeat the less than pleasant breakfast we had the previous morning at our hotel on the boardwalk.   I checked the Trip Adviser app and found the Honey Bee Restaurant, just two blocks away.   We were extremely pleased with the quality of the food and service.  My wife had the Honey Bee Combo of eggs, home fries, bacon, and pancakes, while I had the Western omelette, with home fries, and toast.  The food was great and our waitress was a jewel.   We really enjoyed talking to her off and on while we had breakfast and she came back to see if we needed refills on our coffee and tea, etc.   The Honey Bee is a really great place to eat breakfast or lunch.

data.title: Very Friendly Place
data.text: Stopped in for breakfast and was very impressed with the service! Lady was attentive, helpful, and so nice. We ordered veggie omelets with biscuits and grits. It was good, but wish the veggies had been cooked and softened a little more. Ten dollars a plate and three dollars for a cup of coffee was kind of pricey but is off season so not much competition. We had ice water as well and I wish places that serve it would filter it. Would be so much better. Homey feel and down home food make it a nice place to grab a bite. They do have a buffet, but it wasn't in use this day.

data.title: Great breakfast
data.text: Friendly waiter's and waitresses, very good cooking was good as home.! very conveniently located across the street from my hotel Comfort suites the best biscuits and gravy in the area but only open Friday through the weekend during the off season.

data.title: Great service
data.text: We had lunch here and it was average. I thought it was a little pricey for what you receive. I think that breakfast is where they really shine. I would return and try the breakfast. The service here is fast and friendly.

data.title: great quality food with great prices
data.text: This restaurant is a casual restaurant, excellence food with plenty of varieties to choose from the menu, generous portion, great price with friendly staff. We didn't do the buffet so cant say anything about it. They're close around 3 pm though.

data.title: Great breakfast
data.text: I went to honeybees for their breakfast buffet and it was great. The food was fresh and kept filled. Our server was very friendly and attentive. The price was good as well. I would go back for the biscuits and gravy!!!
